hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
cd $HOME/HOME/Unc85_Refonte; USER=uncwgeep PASS=mCtvuFqz HOST=ftp.cluster015.ovh.net
wget -mnH --cut-dirs=1 ftp://$USER:$PASS@$HOST/www
git add . -v git commit -m 'Sauvegarde journaliere' | true git push origin master -f | true
WPNAME='unc85_refonte' WPDBVERSION=`cat wp-includes/version.php | grep "wp_version =" | cut -d \' -f 2` WPPLUGIN=`find wp-content/plugins/ -type d -maxdepth 1 | cut -f3 -d '/'` URL='https://www.unc85.com/' TYPE='wordpress' curl http://aloa:Palmier-10@dev.timotheebarreteau.fr/post.php -X POST -d "type=$TYPE&name=$WPNAME&version=$WPDBVERSION&plugin=$WPPLUGIN&url=$URL"
